subtitles.transcript: My registrar. They called her Fanta. Fanta Fofana. It hurt me a lot. Then the volunteer. He was the GCHV [general community health volunteer] secretary - Sekou. He used to always tell me, "Pa, wear your gloves-o. Donâ€™t forget-o." He used to advise me. Then he left me [died]. Why? So those are some of the problems sometimes when I lie [down] I think, "Why God this happened?"
